Body:
params = inspect.signature(function).parameters
args = [key for key, param in params.items() if param.kind not in (param.
    VAR_POSITIONAL, param.VAR_KEYWORD)]
if varargs:
    varargs = [param.name for param in params.values() if param.kind ==
        param.VAR_POSITIONAL]
    if len(varargs) == 0:
        varargs = None
    return args, varargs
else:
    return args
